name: IntractableEpilepsyICD10CM
title: Intractable Epilepsy (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: ),(Data Element Scope: Intent for  this data element is to identify ICD10 CM diagnostic codes for epilepsy types that are indicative of intractable epilepsy.),(Inclusion Criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of intractable epilepsy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes unspecified seizure diagnoses diagnostic codes and non-intractable epilepsy diagnostic codes.)
